description:
Khadlaj Oud Noir EDP 100ML is an exquisite Arabic oud fragrance that embodies the essence of Middle Eastern luxury perfumery. This premium oud perfume captivates with its rich, smoky aroma and exceptional longevity.

Experience the Mystique of Khadlaj Oud Noir âœ¨

Immerse yourself in the opulent world of Arabic perfumes with this masterful creation from Khadlaj. The Oud Noir Eau de Parfum is a sophisticated blend that combines traditional oud with modern sensibilities, creating a luxurious fragrance that stands as a testament to the brand's dedication to perfection.

Product Information

Size Gender Product Type Concentration Brand
100ML Unisex Eau de Parfum High Khadlaj

Fragrance Notes ðŸŒ¿

Top Notes Bergamot, Saffron, Pink Pepper
Heart Notes Rose, Agarwood (Oud), Cedarwood
Base Notes Amber, Vanilla, Patchouli, Musk

Key Features of Khadlaj Oud Noir ðŸ’Ž

  • Exceptional longevity with 8-10 hours of projection
  • Premium quality Arabic oud sourced from sustainable plantations
  • Elegant black bottle with gold accents symbolizing luxury
  • Sophisticated unisex appeal suitable for evening wear and special occasions
  • Moderate to heavy sillage that leaves a memorable impression
  • Part of Khadlaj's exclusive best-selling collection

The Heritage of Khadlaj Perfumes ðŸ”¥

Khadlaj Perfumes has established itself as a prominent name in Middle Eastern perfumery, crafting fragrances that blend traditional Arabian scent profiles with contemporary appeal. Founded with a vision to showcase the richness of oud and other precious ingredients, Khadlaj has become synonymous with luxury and authenticity in the fragrance world. Oud Noir represents the pinnacle of their craft, offering a new arrival that has quickly gained popularity among fragrance connoisseurs.

Frequently Asked Question

Q: What makes Khadlaj Oud Noir different from other oud fragrances?

A: Khadlaj Oud Noir stands apart through its perfect balance of smoky oud with sweeter amber and vanilla notes, creating a more approachable yet authentic Arabic oud experience. Unlike many oud fragrances that can be overwhelming, Oud Noir offers sophisticated restraint while maintaining the rich, complex character that oud enthusiasts seek. Its exceptional quality ingredients and masterful blending create a smooth transition between notes, resulting in a more harmonious and versatile fragrance suitable for both oud aficionados and newcomers to Middle Eastern perfumery.
short_description: Khadlaj Oud Noir EDP 100ML is a luxurious Arabic fragrance featuring premium oud, saffron, and rose notes balanced with amber and vanilla. This sophisticated unisex perfume offers exceptional longevity and projects an aura of Middle Eastern opulence with modern sensibility.
